_header: Saint Matthew says in our gospel
Note: For the version in the ‘expanded’ Cycle see 648.
_description: Gospel for the Second Sunday in Lent in the Northern Homily Cycle

BodAsh42.First Lines:
Saynte mathewe sais im oure gospellþat ihesus ȝode als
                    awntir fell…
BodAsh42.Last Lines:
…þarebi a tale now will i telleIf ȝe will here
                    awhile dwelle
BodAsh42.Editions:
Thompson,  Anne B.,
                        ed.  
             The Northern Homily
                    Cycle.
         Kalamazoo, MI: Western Michigan University for TEAMS, 2008.

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
Seint Matheu seiþ in vre gospelÞat Ihesu eode as Aunter
                    fel…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…And beo þis tale may we wel kenHow flesches lust
                    gyleþ wyse men
BodEngPoeta1.Attributed Title:
Egressus Ihesu secessit impertes tyri & sidonis (f.
                        183va)
BodEngPoeta1.Facsimiles:
Doyle,  I. A.,
                        ed.  
             The Vernon Manuscript. A Facsimile of Bodleian Library, Oxford, MS Eng.
                poet.a.1,
          with an introduction by A. I. Doyle. Cambridge: D. S. Brewer, 1987. 
Scase,  Wendy,  and  Nick Kennedy, eds.  
             A facsimile edition of the Vernon manuscript: Oxford, Bodleian Library, MS. Eng. Poet. A. 1.
         Oxford: The Bodleian Library, 2011.

CULAdd8335.First Lines:
SEynt Matheu seys in oure godspelleÞat ihesu went als auenture
                    felle…
CULAdd8335.Last Lines:
…ffor alle by þis tale may we kenneHowe lust makes foles
                    of wyse men

CULDd11.First Lines:
SEynt matthew seyth in oure GospelÞat ihesu ȝede as
                    aunter fel…
CULDd11.Last Lines:
…& be þis tale may we wel kennehow fleschli lust
                    marrith wise menne

CULGg531.First Lines:
Saint Mathew says in oure gospellÞat ihesu wende als aunter
                    fell…
CULGg531.Last Lines:
…And þis woman comm þan hym toAnd lauted hym als hyr
                    aghte to do…

BLAdd38010.First Lines:
Saint mathew sais in our gospellThat ihesus ȝude als aunter
                    fell…
BLAdd38010.Last Lines:
…How luste mas foules wysemenAnd by þis tall may ȝe
                    well kene

MinULZ822.First Lines:
Saynte mathew says in oure gospellþat Ihesu ȝode als
                    aunter fell…
MinULZ822.Last Lines:
…& by þis tale may men kenehow lust mase folys
                    vnwysmen

HunHM129.First Lines:
Seint mathew seith in oure gospellÞat ihesu ȝede as a
                    tyme fell…
HunHM129.Last Lines:
…Þat may ȝe se by an hermyteþat for lykynge
                    lefft his habyte
